class.name: JavaClassWrapper
class.brief_description: Provides access to the Java Native Interface.

method.name: get_exception
method.description: Returns the Java exception from the last call into a Java class. If there was no exception, it will return [code]null[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] This method only works on Android. On every other platform, this method will always return [code]null[/code].

method.name: wrap
method.description: Wraps a class defined in Java, and returns it as a [JavaClass] [Object] type that Godot can interact with. [b]Note:[/b] This method only works on Android. On every other platform, this method does nothing and returns an empty [JavaClass].
